Posts.Content: Jun 26, 2008 07:44PM matlock wrote: Hi everyone. I'm new here but have been reading your posts for several weeks now. I had a bilateral mastectomy last week - waiting for my final histo results. Was diagnosed with invasive ductal carcinoma when I had the lump removed in May. I have received lots of info and timbits from reading all your posts - Thank you. Its a scarey time but it always helps to know that you are not the only one. Matlock from Canada
Posts.Title: Surgery in June? carollyn Kymberlyn
